title: Schedule Annual Preventive Maintenance
description: A property manager needs to schedule annual preventive maintenance, such as HVAC servicing and gutter cleaning, for a property.

tasks.description: Identify that annual HVAC service is due based on the property's maintenance schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is alerted by the system that maintenance is due.

tasks.description: Create work orders for HVAC servicing and gutter cleaning and assign them to approved vendors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Work orders are created and dispatched.

tasks.description: Notify the tenant of the upcoming maintenance appointments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tenant is informed of the date and time of the service.
